| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | resvbas.1 | |- H = ( G |`v A ) |

| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_resvbas | |- ( A e. V -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` H ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_resvplusg | |- ( A e. V -> ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` H ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( A e. V /\ ( x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` H ) y ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 5, 8 | #P_grpidpropd | |- ( A e. V -> ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` H ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( A e. V -> .0. = ( 0g ` H ) ) |
